ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:0.5_0: 39. The training rule on during the rainy season
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.2_0: the nuns went wandering during the rainy season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.4_0: “How can the nuns go wandering during the rainy season? They are trampling down crops and grass, harming life with one sense faculty, and destroying many small beings.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.7_0: “How can nuns go wandering during the rainy season?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun goes wandering during the rainy season, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.6_0: not having stayed put for the first three or the last three months of the rainy season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.8_0: when the villages are a chicken’s flight apart, then for every next village he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.9_0: When it is an uninhabited area, a wilderness, then for every six kilometers he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.2_0: if she goes on seven-day business;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.3_0: if she goes because something is disturbing her;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.4_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.7_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on nine, is finished.
